name: Halloween Monster Match
description:
Halloween Monster Scramble

Welcome to Halloween Monster Match, Trick or Treat has come again and while the children are playing how about teaching them some Halloween vocabulary as well. You have to match Monsters Witches, Vampires, Pumpkins, Monster Plants, Werewolves, Mummies, Zombies etc. As many as you can in 60 seconds!

I hope you have fast fingers!!

Great for those trips in the back of the car to Halloween parties or for fun in school lessons.

There are two games in the app the second is Scary Opposites which will help with learning antonyms as well.   

It's a fun way to help celebrate Halloween

Features

Loads of Great quality Halloween Images

Child Friendly

Easy and quick to use

Easy menu and interface for young learners

Quick to play so can use in classrooms and school

Totally Free!.
